title: Ep. 457 - Talking Turkey At Thanksgiving
description:
How can liberals possibly talk to their crazy conservative uncle at Thanksgiving? Trump pardons turkeys, CNN spreads fake news about the Pilgrims, and Lie-awatha has little to be thankful for. Date: 11-27-2019
